about_the_game:
The original soundtrack of the game Red Risk, produced by Igo Carminatti.

Track list:

01. Igo Carminatti - Insanity
02. Igo Carminatti - Rage
03. Igo Carminatti - Convicted
04. Igo Carminatti - Drum Solo
05. Igo Carminatti - Life or Death
06. Igo Carminatti - Blood Spill
07. Igo Carminatti - Troll
08. Igo Carminatti - Red Dancers

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 or compatible
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 1024 MB
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Red Risk (Soundtrack)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 or compatible
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240 (or better)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
